vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at 1Ch.3.19;
son of: Pedaiah (H6305H);
brother of: Shimei (H8096J);
father of: Meshullam (H4918H), Hananiah (H2608L), Shelomith (H8019I), Hashubah (H2807), Ohel (H0169), Berechiah (H1296), Hasadiah (H2619), Jushab-hesed (H3142) and Abiud (G0010); also called Sheshbazzar at Ezr.1.8,11; 5.14,16; KJV: Zorobabel at Mat.1.12,13;
Aramaic of ze.rub.ba.vel (זְרֻבָּבֶ֫ל "Zerubbabel" H2216)
§ Sheshbazzar = "worshipper of fire"
the prince of Judah at the first return from exile in Babylon; usually identified as the Babylonian name for Zerubbabel
vocabInfos._es_Definition: gobernador de Israel; tribu de Judá; post exílico
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
設巴薩 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "火的敬拜者"
被擄歸回的猶大皇室首領, 一般認為就是所羅巴伯 (拉 5:14,16)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
设巴萨 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "火的敬拜者"
被掳归回的犹大皇室首领, 一般认为就是所罗巴伯 (拉 5:14,16)
